item.text: This saying is trustworthy: “If someone aspires to the office of overseer, he desires a good work.”

The <st data-num="1985" class="">overseer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> <st data-num="1163">must</st> <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="423" class="">above reproach</st>, the <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> of <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3524" class="">temperate</st>, <st data-num="4998" class="">self-controlled</st>, <st data-num="2887" class="">respectable</st>, <st data-num="5382" class="">hospitable</st>, an <st data-num="1317">able teacher</st>,

<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="3943" class="">drunkard</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4131" class="">violent</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1933" class="">gentle</st>, <st data-num="269">not contentious</st>, <st data-num="866">free from the love of money</st>.

He must <st data-num="4291" class="">manage</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st> and <st data-num="2192" class="">keep</st> his <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5292" class="">control</st> <st data-num="3326 3956">without losing</st> his <st data-num="4587">dignity</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> to <st data-num="4291" class="">manage</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st>, <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> will he <st data-num="1959" class="">care</st> for the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?

He must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be a <st data-num="3504">recent convert</st>, or he may <st data-num="5187">become arrogant</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="1706" class="">fall</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2917" class="">punishment</st> that the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> will exact.<n id="2" />
And he must be well thought of by those outside the faith, so that he may not fall into disgrace and be caught by the devil’s trap.
Deacons likewise must be dignified, not two-faced, not given to excessive drinking, not greedy for gain,

<st data-num="2192" class="">holding</st> to the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> of the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="2513" class="">clear</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> must be <st data-num="1381" class="">tested</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> and <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> let them <st data-num="1247">serve as deacons</st> if they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> found <st data-num="410" class="">blameless</st>.

<st data-num="5615" class="">Likewise</st> also their <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st><n id="1" /> must be <st data-num="4586" class="">dignified</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1228" class="">slanderous</st>, <st data-num="3524" class="">temperate</st>, <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">every respect</st>.

<st data-num="1249" class="">Deacons</st> must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husbands</st> of <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2573" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4291" class="">managers</st> of their <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2398">their own</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">households</st>.
For those who have served well as deacons gain a good standing for themselves and great boldness in the faith that is in Christ Jesus.
I hope to come to you soon, but I am writing these instructions to you

<st data-num="1437">in case</st> I am <st data-num="1019" class="">delayed</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> let you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> people <st data-num="1163" class="">ought</st> to <st data-num="390" class="">conduct</st> themselves<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3748">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, the <st data-num="4769" class="">support</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1477" class="">bulwark</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

And we all agree, our religion contains amazing revelation:

He was revealed in the flesh,

vindicated by the Spirit,

seen by angels,

proclaimed among Gentiles,

believed on in the world,

taken up in glory.
